FAQ / Alpha Trion Protocols / Wave 2 / Characters /

Thrust - Boisterous Brawler

  1. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    What happens if I have both Thrust and Dirge in their Brave modes?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 2 FAQ]
    The attacker chooses which character with Brave they would like to attack.
  2. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    For Thrust’s Revenge ability, can I play the Upgrade on a character like Dreadwing or Raider Tailwind?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 2 FAQ]
    Yes, you may play an upgrade on a Plane or Seeker provided the character being upgraded meets the requirement of the upgrade.
  3. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    If Thrust is KO’ed on my opponent’s turn, can I still play the Upgrade from his Revenge ability?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 2 FAQ]
    Yes.
